info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Rabun and west central Oconee Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Walhalla, or 5 miles southwest of Oconee State Park, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walhalla, Westminster, Oconee State Park, Mountain Rest and Long Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
